docs.snippet: Offensive lineman Brandon Moore, who agreed to a deal with Dallas on Tuesday night, called the Cowboys on Wednesday with a change of heart, Coach Jason Garrett said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Offensive lineman Brandon Moore, who agreed to a deal with Dallas on Tuesday night, called the Cowboys on Wednesday with a change of heart, Coach Jason Garrett said.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; former New York Jets offensive lineman Brandon Moore backs out of deal with Dallas Cowboys and plans to retire; other football developments noted.

headline.main: Set to Play for Dallas, Ex-Jet Elects to Retire
headline.print_headline: Having Agreed to Play for Dallas, Ex-Jet Elects to Retire

docs.snippet: Eli Manning’s rapping ability in a DirectTV video that went viral was the topic of conversation at Giants training camp....
docs.lead_paragraph: Eli Manning’s rapping ability in a DirectTV video that went viral was the topic of conversation at Giants training camp.
docs.abstract: Rap video made by DirecTV featuring the Manning brothers goes viral and is the topic of conversation at New York Giants training camp; for the typically football-obsessed Eli Manning, the commercial is the latest in a growing list of side ventures.

headline.main: Eli the Rapper Gets a Thumbs Up From Some Big Critics
headline.print_headline: Eli the Rapper and Pitchman Gets a Thumbs Up From Some Big Critics

docs.snippet: Mr. Wolman, a real estate developer, fulfilled his childhood dream of owning the N.F.L.’s Philadelphia Eagles in 1963, at age 36, and also was a co-founder of the N.H.L.’s Philadelphia Flyers in the 1960s....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Wolman, a real estate developer, fulfilled his childhood dream of owning the N.F.L.’s Philadelphia Eagles in 1963, at age 36, and also was a co-founder of the N.H.L.’s Philadelphia Flyers in the 1960s.
docs.abstract: Jerry Wolman, real estate developer who fulfilled his childhood dream of owning the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles in 1963 at age 36, and who also co-founded the NHL's Philadelphia Flyers in the 1960s, dies at age 86.

headline.main: Jerry Wolman, Eagles and Flyers Owner, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Jerry Wolman, Eagles and Flyers Owner, Dies at 86

docs.snippet: A former college football star who disappeared in the Michigan wilderness during a fishing trip died of pneumonia caused by inhaling his vomit, after he became disoriented possibly because of a painkiller combined with having a degenerative brain ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A former college football star who disappeared in the Michigan wilderness during a fishing trip died of pneumonia caused by inhaling his vomit, after he became disoriented possibly because of a painkiller combined with having a degenerative brain disease, according to a report released Thursday.

headline.main: Autopsy: QB Died From Pneumonia, Had Brain Disease
headline.print_headline: Autopsy: QB Died From Pneumonia, Had Brain Disease

docs.lead_paragraph: Fox Sports agreed to a 12-year deal to carry the Open starting in 2015 on both its broadcast network and Fox Sports 1, a cable network that starts this month.
docs.abstract: Fox Sports agrees to a 12-year deal to carry the United States Open golf tournament starting in 2015 on both its broadcast network and Fox Sports 1, new cable network.

headline.main: Adding Golf to Its Lineup, Fox Sports Acquires Rights to United States Open
headline.print_headline: Fox Gets Into Golf Business With U.S. Open
